content: CI for https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/9283 just failed with an error in the docs test that _seems_ unrelated to the change. Anyone know what this is about? https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/9283/checks?check_run_id=2240169772
rustc has different error output if you pass -Z unstable-options, maybe it's the same for -Z allow-features?
Yea, looks like rustc changed the error it displays for that particular example. I can push a PR.
